author: sirkay1
body:
# Advertising campaign #
Hey, I am joining in the advertising campaign again for week 46 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2024-11-15 to 2024-11-21.

![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmcoJcp99W6BXbXHbuREgeHVYGEGZdibHaSPpnvpTyeucL/screenshot_20240322_132059.jpg)[Source](https://hive.blog/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-job-241115-week-46-for-worldmappin) 

Please follow @worldmappin. The people behind this account work on a cool hive tool and help their members, when they are in need.

>@worldmappin is a team, that operates the site https://worldmappin.com. Whith this tool every hive user can write a travel blog and earn some good Hive, if the quality of the post is good (rules). To check this, there are some curators in the team. One of them has a terrible hospital bill to pay. @worldmappin has send 500 HBD to their friend and colleage to help him.

![BsyIqNQcV4n1a1No_WhatsApp_Image_2024-11-18_at_11.03.09_PM.webp](https://cdn.liketu.com/media/barbyjr/images/BsyIqNQcV4n1a1No_WhatsApp_Image_2024-11-18_at_11.03.09_PM/BsyIqNQcV4n1a1No_WhatsApp_Image_2024-11-18_at_11.03.09_PM.webp)
</center>
</liketuimages>

Hello friends of Liketu üëãüèª I hope you are all doing well and that your week has started wonderfully! This time I am sharing with you some beautiful photographs, where you can see a spectacular sunset. Since I was little I have loved sunsets, I feel that they transmit a lot of relaxation when I see them for a while. I was able to capture these moments, just before the sun went down. Connecting with nature üåÑ is the best feeling, and the best thing we can do is take care of it. I hope you like it, thank you very much for visiting my blog! Until next time.

"Please follow @worldmappin. The people behind this account work on a cool hive tool and help their members, when they are in need."

author: luisfe
root_title: My Shadow to ""Shadow Hunters SMASh Contest-Round 348"
body:
https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/luisfe/23tmKrue4NhpXB9mSfjFQsKmeZjRyyp5gv99czzptmPaYmrMeR1x2nQLxSEdfjL6hssYf.jpg


Hello community, I wish for each of you‚Ä¶ well‚Ä¶ us, a week full of beautiful things on all levels. May we have our eyes wide open and the GPS of our faith turned on so that we can perceive. value and enjoy the miracles that occur daily both around us and in ourselves. I present for your consideration two photos of the same object but seen ‚Äì or focused ‚Äì from a different angle. Of course, the first one above is for the contest and the second to complement ‚Äì outside of the contest ‚Äì the image of the first. The shade that I bring to the contest today is from an ornamental plant whose scientific name I do not know, but which receives two different names here in Venezuela. In some states it is called ‚ÄúCow Tongue‚Äù but in others it is called ‚ÄúMother-in-Law's Tongue‚Äù

https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/luisfe/23xAW4rVTM9cUsyo7QrpjNhTJLTuCrZjtizNVPfDYEyjWNoSQ7CC695RtwqNrmPp51dJp.jpg

If you have not yet participated in this contest organized by @melinda010100, I invite you to do it. You will discover the beauty hidden in the shadows that did not catch your attention before.
You can read the contest rules by clicking [here]( https://peakd.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-013b936f65138 )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdEFNi1YpujDyWycN9USEEUydPQ5S8t8tVnHMa4dfMVu1/separador.png

**Versi√≥n en castellano**
https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/luisfe/23tmKrue4NhpXB9mSfjFQsKmeZjRyyp5gv99czzptmPaYmrMeR1x2nQLxSEdfjL6hssYf.jpg


Hola, comunidad, deseo para cada uno de ustedes‚Ä¶ bueno‚Ä¶ de nosotros, una semana llena de cosas bellas en todos los niveles. Que tengamos los ojos bien abiertos y el GPS de nuestra f√© encendido para que podamos percibir. valorar y disfrutar los milagros que ocurren a diario tanto a nuestro alrededor como en nosotros mismos. Presento a su consideraci√≥n dos fotos del mismo objeto pero visto ‚Äì o enfocado ‚Äì desde distinto √°ngulo. Por supuesto, la primera de arriba es para el concurso y la segunda para complementar ‚Äì fuera del concurso ‚Äì la imagen de la primera. La sombra que traigo hoy a concurso es de una planta ornamental cuyo nombre cient√≠fico desconozco, pero que recibe dos nombres diferentes ac√° en Venezuela. En algunos estados es llamada ‚ÄúLengua de vaca‚Äù pero en otros recibe la denominaci√≥n de ‚ÄúLengua de suegra‚Äù
Si a√∫

https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/luisfe/23xAW4rVTM9cUsyo7QrpjNhTJLTuCrZjtizNVPfDYEyjWNoSQ7CC695RtwqNrmPp51dJp.jpg


n no has participado en este concurso convocado por @melinda010100, te invito a que lo hagas. Descubrir√°s la belleza oculta en las sombras que antes no llamaban tu atenci√≥n.
Puedes leer las bases del concurso clicando [ac√°]( https://peakd.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-013b936f65138 )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdEFNi1YpujDyWycN9USEEUydPQ5S8t8tVnHMa4dfMVu1/separador.png

Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga.
Thank you very much for visiting my blog and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you,
Your visit to my blog is very important to me, I hope you liked the result of my work as a shadowhunter and leave with the intention of returning.
Tu visita a mi blog es muy importante para m√≠. Espero que te haya gustado el resultado de mi trabajo como cazador de sombras y te vayas con la intenci√≥n de regresar.

author: sayury
root_title: Praise and Worship Music Week 45 "Padre, vuelvo a T√≠" Cover by @sayury
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmP7MUjBc1nDCKNc2ggAMxXCSrCqSPHqEBEiSJUoYfZ753/week_45.jpg https://youtu.be/stwd1_3xO5c


**
ESPA√ëOL
**
Saludos para todos los miembros de esta maravillosa comunidad, hoy, primer d√≠a de la semana, d√≠a importante porque recordamos que nuestro Se√±or Jes√∫s resucit√≥ un primer d√≠a de la semana. La palabra "domingo" proviene del lat√≠n tard√≠o dies dominƒ≠cus , que significa "d√≠a del Se√±or" y el domingo se consagr√≥ como el d√≠a del Se√±or en memoria de la resurrecci√≥n de Jes√∫s. Cuando vi que la tem√°tica de esta semana era "Regreso", de inmediato record√© la par√°bola del hijo pr√≥digo. Para quienes no conocen la historia, una "par√°bola" es una "comparaci√≥n" y fue un recurso literario muy utilizado por nuestro Se√±or para dar a entender a las mentes sencillas las verdades eternas. En una oportunidad √âl cont√≥ la par√°bola del hijo pr√≥digo. El Diccionario del Estudiante de la Real Academia de la Lengua Espa√±ola define "pr√≥digo" en tres acepciones diferentes, la que encaja perfectamente con la historia contada por nuestro Se√±or es [Que desperdicia o malgasta sus bienes. ](https://www.rae.es/diccionario-estudiante/pr%C3%B3digo#:~:text=adj.,mes%20pr%C3%B3digo%20en%20estrenos%20cinematogr%C3%A1ficos.) Y esto es lo que ocurre en dicha historia que narra el Evangelio seg√∫n San Lucas en el cap√≠tulo 15 y en los vers√≠culos del 1 al 32. Basicamente se trata de un hombre adinerado que ten√≠a dos hijos, el menor de los cuales le pidi√≥ su herencia en vida. El hombre se la di√≥. Dicho joven se march√≥ de su casa con el dinero y lo malgast√≥ en fiestas, celebraciones y en bridar al "mont√≥n" de supuestos amigos que consigui√≥ de esa manera. Cuando comenz√≥ a faltarle el dinero se encontraba ya muy lejos de la casa del padre y cuando esper√≥ contar con el apoyo de los amigos, estos desaparecieron. Se vi√≥ obligado, pues, a emplearse como obrero en una hacienda. All√≠ cuidaba de los puercos. Pas√≥ mucho trabajo y hambre, al punto que cuenta la historia que hubiera deseado poder comer lo que com√≠an los cerdos para saciarse. Entonces reflexion√≥ que en su casa en ese momento los obreros de su padre estar√≠an bien alimentados mientras √©l por ac√° pasaba hambre y decidi√≥ regresar, pedir perd√≥n a su padre y solicitar que lo empleara como obrero. Pero cuando lleg√≥, y le pidi√≥ perd√≥n dici√©ndole que ya no merec√≠a ser llamado su hijo y que lo tomara como obrero, su padre lo abraz√≥ con alegr√≠a y mando hacer una fiesta para celebrar su regreso. Mand√≥ matar un becerro gordo , le hizo poner ropa nueva, un anillo en su dedo y el hijo mayor se puso celoso, le reclam√≥ el hecho de que siendo √©l juicioso y estando siempre trabajando con √©l nunca le hab√≠a dado ni siquiera un cabrito para celebrar con sus amigos, en cambio ahora montaba esa gran fiesta por este hijo que se hab√≠a portado tan mal. Entonces el padre le explic√≥ que √©l , como su hijo, siempre estaba con √©l, p√©ro el otro lo hab√≠a considerado ya perdido, como si estuviera muerto y ahora, hab√≠a regresado, como si hubiera revivido. La ense√±anza de esta par√°bola es la misma de la oveja perdida: que en el Cielo hay m√°s alegr√≠a por un pecador que se arrepiente y cambia de vida que por cien justos que no necesitan arrepentimiento. Esta par√°bola la vivimos en nuestra existencia cada vez que le fallamos al Padre y de una u otra forma nos alejamos de √âl. Cuando nos acercamos nuevamente en b√∫squeda de su perd√≥n para encontrarnos siempre bien aceptados por su amor misericordioso. Y es tambi√©n una ense√±anza para no denigrar del hermano que cae, sino pedir a Dios lo ayude a volver y a restablecer su vida espiritual. La canci√≥n que les traigo hoy, basada en esta par√°bola, se llama "Padre, vuelvo a T√≠" y es un canto de amor, una oraci√≥n de reconciliaci√≥n que espero les guste y sea de bendici√≥n para sus vidas.
Invito a los siguientes tres hivers a participar en esta interesante iniciativa:
@mirel0510
@thonyt05
@nellynohemi
**
ENGLISH
**
https://images.ecency.com/DQmP7MUjBc1nDCKNc2ggAMxXCSrCqSPHqEBEiSJUoYfZ753/week_45.jpg

Greetings to all the members of this wonderful community, today, the first day of the week, an important day because we remember that our Lord Jesus resurrected on the first day of the week. The spanish word "Domingo" (Sunday) comes from the late Latin dies dominƒ≠cus, meaning "day of the Lord" and Sunday was consecrated as the Lord's day in memory of the resurrection of Jesus. When I saw that this week's theme was "Return", I immediately remembered the parable of the prodigal son. For those who do not know the story, a "parable" is a "comparison" and was a literary device widely used by our Lord to make simple minds understand eternal truths. On one occasion He told the parable of the prodigal son. The Student Dictionary of the Royal Academy of the Spanish Language defines "prodigal" in three different meanings, the one that fits perfectly with the story told by our Lord is [That he wastes or wastes his goods. ](https://www.rae.es/diccionario-estudiante/pr%C3%B3digo#:~:text=adj.,mes%20pr%C3%B3digo%20en%20estrenos%20cinematogr%C3%A1ficos.) And this is what happens in the story narrated in the Gospel according to Saint Luke in chapter 15 and in verses 1 to 32. Basically it is about a wealthy man who had two sons, the youngest of whom asked him for his inheritance while he was alive. The man gave it to him. Said young man left home with the money and wasted it on parties, celebrations and bridging the "bunch" of supposed friends he made that way. When he began to run out of money, he was already very far from his father's house and when he expected to have the support of his friends, they disappeared. He was forced, therefore, to work as a worker on a farm. There he took care of the pigs. He went through a lot of work and hunger, to the point that the story goes that he wished he could eat what the pigs ate to satisfy himself. Then he reflected that in his house at that time his father's workers would be well fed while he was hungry here and he decided to return, ask his father for forgiveness and request that he be employed as a worker. But when he arrived, and asked for forgiveness, telling him that he no longer deserved to be called his son and that he should take him as a worker, his father hugged him with joy and ordered a party to be held to celebrate his return. He had a fat calf killed , he made him put on new clothes, a ring on his finger and his eldest son became jealous, he complained to him about the fact that, being judicious and always working with him, he had never given him even a goat to celebrate with his friends, however now he was having this big party for this son who had behaved so badly. Then the father explained to him that he, like his son, was always with him, but the other had considered him already lost, as if he were dead and now, he had returned, as if he had revived. The teaching of this parable is the same as that of the lost sheep: that in Heaven there is more joy over one sinner who repents and changes his life than over a hundred righteous people who do not need repentance. We live this parable in our existence every time we fail the Father and in one way or another we distance ourselves from Him. When we approach again in search of His forgiveness to always find ourselves well accepted by His merciful love. And it is also a teaching not to denigrate the brother who falls, but to ask God to help him return and reestablish his spiritual life. The song I bring you today, based on this parable, is called "Father, I return to You" and it is a song of love, a prayer of reconciliation that I hope you like and that it will be a blessing for your lives.
I invite the following three hivers to participate in this interesting initiative:
@mirel0510
@thonyt05
@nellynohemi

Este es el tema original, interpretado por el grupo espa√±ol "Kairoi"
This is the original song, performed by the Spanish group "Kairoi"
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w0op0xI5VgU

LETRA Querido Padre, cansado vuelvo a Ti, haz que conozca el don de tu amistad, vivir por siempre el gozo del perd√≥n, y en tu presencia, tu fiesta celebrar. Pongo en tus manos mis culpas, Oh Se√±or, estoy seguro de que eres siempre fiel, dame la fuerza para poder andar, buscando en todo hacer tu voluntad. / Padre, yo busco tu amor, Padre, vuelvo a ti; mira que tu hijo soy, Padre, vuelvo a ti /2 Lo reconozco, a veces olvid√© que eres mi Padre y que a mi lado est√°s, que soy tu hijo y me aceptas como soy, s√≥lo me pides: ¬´vive en sinceridad¬ª. Quiero sentirte cercano a m√≠, Se√±or, o√≠r tu voz, que me habla al coraz√≥n, sentirme libre desde tu libertad, ser signo vivo de la fraternidad. / Padre, yo busco tu amor, Padre, vuelvo a ti; mira que tu hijo soy, Padre, vuelvo a ti /2 [Fuente](https://www.oblatos.com/querido-padre-cansado-vuelvo-a-ti/) LYRICS Dear Father, tired I return to You, let me know the gift of your friendship, live forever the joy of forgiveness, and in your presence, celebrate your party. I put my faults in your hands, Oh Lord, I am sure that you are always faithful, give me the strength to be able to walk, seeking in everything to do your will. / Father, I seek your love, Father, I return to you; See that I am your son, Father, I return to you /2 I admit it, sometimes I forget that you are my Father and that you are at my side, that I am your son and you accept me as I am, You only ask me: "live in sincerity." I want to feel You close to me, Lord, hear your voice, which speaks to my heart, feel free from your freedom, be a living sign of fraternity. / Father, I seek your love, Father, I return to You; See that I am your son, Father, I return to you /2

‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§‚ô©https://images.ecency.com/DQmV7WLUhQumBxh1FWRT43Ab2EqksnGiUwC49RW2hTrHYDJ/a_separador_sayury.png‚ô©üé∂üéµüé§

author: luisfe
root_title: My Entry To Shadow Hunters Smash Contest Round 347
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmX3RRRSZ5bpRwT5AGwo3QCBrje5ogfVPbxz3nMST1HBbe/1_luisfe.jpg


Hello community, I hope you are well and everyone has success in their shadow hunts this week. I found some very good combined shadows, I was really torn between which one to place as the main shadow. I was walking through the center of town when I saw the shadows of some bars and then I noticed the combination of these with a palm tree. Of course, I photographed both. But on the way back, a man was sitting on the same sidewalk and the combination of his shadow with the others was truly spectacular. I am satisfied with my hunting this week. I hope you like it too.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmcPNTkmV92gVY2yJ34qDg5aDQ6zQ9YV2oGmSvS9HPExyG/2_luisfe.jpg

https://images.ecency.com/DQmUKS798U6b2i7XTtddNGkWzraZm4nkBsvmmhQaMPuaw9m/3_luisfe.jpg

If you have not yet participated in this contest organized by @melinda010100, I invite you to do it. You will discover the beauty hidden in the shadows that did not catch your attention before.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmPKCxGymTH5GxgHun71uZFqCPSuyG9QAZgPMWMDeYN7Su/4_luisfe.jpg

If you have not yet participated in this contest organized by @melinda010100, I invite you to do it. You will discover the beauty hidden in the shadows that did not catch your attention before.
If you have not yet participated in this contest organized by @melinda010100, I invite you to do it. You will discover the beauty hidden in the shadows that did not catch your attention before.
You can read the contest rules by clicking [here]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-669d113a2489a )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdEFNi1YpujDyWycN9USEEUydPQ5S8t8tVnHMa4dfMVu1/separador.png

**Versi√≥n en castellano**

https://images.ecency.com/DQmX3RRRSZ5bpRwT5AGwo3QCBrje5ogfVPbxz3nMST1HBbe/1_luisfe.jpg

Hola, comunidad, espero se encuentren muy bien y todos tengan √©xito en sus cacer√≠as de sombras de esta semana. Yo me encontr√© con unas sombras combinadas muy buenas, realmente estuve dudoso entre cual colocar como sombra principal.
https://images.ecency.com/DQmcPNTkmV92gVY2yJ34qDg5aDQ6zQ9YV2oGmSvS9HPExyG/2_luisfe.jpg

https://images.ecency.com/DQmUKS798U6b2i7XTtddNGkWzraZm4nkBsvmmhQaMPuaw9m/3_luisfe.jpg

Iba por el centro del pueblo cuando vi las sombras de unas rejas y luego not√© la combinaci√≥n de estas con una palmera. Por supuesto, fotografi√© ambas. Pero al regreso, en la misma acera estaba sentado un se√±or y la combinaci√≥n de su sombra con las otras era realmente espectacular. Estoy satisfecho de mi caza esta semana. Espero que a ustedes tambi√©n les agrade. Alegr√≠a y bienestar para todos.

https://images.ecency.com/DQmPKCxGymTH5GxgHun71uZFqCPSuyG9QAZgPMWMDeYN7Su/4_luisfe.jpg

Si a√∫n no has participado en este concurso convocado por @melinda010100, te invito a que lo hagas. Descubrir√°s la belleza oculta en las sombras que antes no llamaban tu atenci√≥n.
Puedes leer las bases del concurso clicando [ac√°]( https://ecency.com/hive-179017/@melinda010100/shadow-hunters-smash-contest-round-669d113a2489a )
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdEFNi1YpujDyWycN9USEEUydPQ5S8t8tVnHMa4dfMVu1/separador.png

Muchas gracias por visitar mi blog y leer mi post. Espero que esta sea una semana llena de cosas buenas para ti y tu familia. Dios te bendiga.
Thank you very much for visiting my blog and reading my post. I hope this be a week full of good things for you and your family. God bless you,
Your visit to my blog is very important to me, I hope you liked the result of my work as a shadowhunter and leave with the intention of returning.
Tu visita a mi blog es muy importante para m√≠. Espero que te haya gustado el resultado de mi trabajo como cazador de sombras y te vayas con la intenci√≥n de regresar.
Fotos propias tomadas con celular Krip K55H /Own photos taken with Krip K55H Cell Phone

author: carmencitavdc
body:
https://images.ecency.com/DQmdisB7hb5h3kYc47byhtMjnkvQzveVrtiZHZMXf4Eh9Y2/sin_t_tulo.png
[Fuente: Pixabay.com](https://pixabay.com/es/photos/rosas-flores-cielo-rosas-rojas-1619566/) https://images.ecency.com/DQmejB1RyG1MEzNSYKPKs8NKVEwsavQ5hErzcngX3ix5eWf/sin_t_tulo.png
Me quedo impresionada delante de los sucesos de la vida, el diario cotidiano. F√≠jense, somos energ√≠a Lo manifestamos en vida y despu√©s de muertos yo creo que tambi√©n. Cerca de una florister√≠a de un poblado cercano, falleci√≥ una se√±ora y su nuera - con la que nunca se llev√≥ bien - llam√≥ del exterior para mandarle hacer un bello ramo de rosas para que sirviera de ornato al ata√∫d en ese momento. Entre tanto dolor y tristeza dar√≠an el toque hermoso porque la naturaleza es hermosa y las flores rojas ¬°Las rosas rojas! dan un agradable perfume y tambi√©n embellecen el panorama. Lo cierto del caso es que cuando la se√±ora de la florister√≠a se dirige a la funeraria a entregar el ramo - muy lindo √©l - se da cuenta que ya hab√≠an sacado de all√≠ a la se√±ora para llevarla a cremar. Telefone√≥ a los familiares, a la persona que hab√≠a encargado el ramo y le dijo lo que hab√≠a pasado. -- No, no se preocupe, me comunicar√© con los familiares de all√° para que vayan a recoger el ramo Total que como la se√±ora que encarg√≥ el ramo era la nuera no querida en vida por la difunta pareciera ser que despu√©s de muerta mucho menos, porque imag√≠nense: ¬°El ramo dur√≥ tres d√≠as en la florister√≠a! Cada ma√±ana, la due√±a de la florister√≠a llamaba: -- ¬°Mire, el ramo, que lo tengo aqu√≠! -- No, no, ya lo vamos a buscar. ¬°Nunca llegaban! Bueno... en eso transcurrieron tres d√≠as. Yo digo: ¬øSer√° que la se√±ora no quer√≠a flores o todo lo origin√≥ el hecho de que no quer√≠a a la que mand√≥ el ramo? F√≠jense cuanto tard√≥ ese ramo en llegar a su destino. Total que, bueno, al fin y al cabo, despu√©s de esos tres largos y penosos d√≠as viendo el ramo all√≠, lo vinieron a recoger. No se si se lo pondr√≠an a las cenizas o... ¬°Qui√©n sabe! Lo cierto del caso es que... ¬°Fijense! La gente hasta despu√©s de muerta mantiene su misma actitud de vida, su misma energ√≠a. Menos mal que a la se√±ora de la florister√≠a le habian pagado el ramo con anticipaci√≥n porque si no .. ¬°Imag√≠nense! Hubiese sido una p√©rdida de dinero y de tiempo. ¬°As√≠ son las cosas! Saludos a todos, especialmente a los amigos @yusmi, @gaborockstar, @capitandelbam, @sacra97, @barbyjr, @lcampesina, @encuentro, @jlufer, @miprimerconcurso, @leopard0, @gpache.

https://images.ecency.com/DQmZ4W3VqRtq99b97dNCau2Awwqa155wVSYLzXJbYN2LPXa/separador.png
ENGLISH VERSION


https://images.ecency.com/DQmdisB7hb5h3kYc47byhtMjnkvQzveVrtiZHZMXf4Eh9Y2/sin_t_tulo.png
[Fuente: Pixabay.com](https://pixabay.com/es/photos/rosas-flores-cielo-rosas-rojas-1619566/) https://images.ecency.com/DQmejB1RyG1MEzNSYKPKs8NKVEwsavQ5hErzcngX3ix5eWf/sin_t_tulo.png
I am impressed by the events of life, the daily diary. Look, we are energy We manifest it in life and after death, I believe that too. Near a flower shop in a nearby town, a woman died and her daughter-in-law - with whom she never got along - called from outside to order to the lady of the flower shop to make a beautiful bouquet of roses to serve as decoration for the coffin at that moment. In the midst of so much pain and sadness, they would give the beautiful touch because nature is beautiful and red flowers, red roses! They give a pleasant perfume and also beautify the panorama. The truth of the matter is that when the lady from the florist goes to the funeral home to deliver the bouquet - very nice - she realizes that they had already taken the lady out of there to take her to be cremated. She called the family, the person who had ordered the bouquet, and told her what had happened. -- No, don't worry, I will contact the relatives there so they can pick up the bouquet After all, since the lady who ordered the bouquet was the daughter-in-law not loved in life by the deceased, it seems that after she died much less, because imagine: The bouquet lasted three days at the florist! Every morning, the owner of the flower shop called: -- Look, the bouquet, I have it here! -- No, no, we're going to look for it. They never came! Well... three days passed. I say: Could it be that the lady didn't want flowers or was it all caused by the fact that she didn't love the person who sent the bouquet? Look how long it took for that bouquet to reach its destination. Well, after all, after those three long and painful days seeing the bouquet there, they came to pick it up. I don't know if they would put it in the ashes or... Who knows! The truth of the matter is that... Look! Even after death, people maintain the same attitude to life, their same energy. Luckily the lady at the florist had been paid for the bouquet in advance because if not .. Imagine! It would have been a waste of money and time. That's how things are!
https://images.ecency.com/DQmZ4W3VqRtq99b97dNCau2Awwqa155wVSYLzXJbYN2LPXa/separador.png
**Puedes seguirme en las redes si lo deseas You can follow me on the networks if you wish**

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100073917156627)

[Blogger](https://www.lavalijadeneycar.blogspot.com)

author: advertisingbot2
root_title: Hive Marketing Job 241115 Week 46 For Worldmappin
body:
Hello everyone who wants to earn some small money,

here I announce the next advertising job for week 46 from sponsor @achimmertens, period: 2024-11-15 to 2024-11-21.

![Earn Money(2).png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKAr2pK3Nw7DhpREEcx2yQ1dSe3BQ4KKDFLKAWjNL9Ni952afaaKuqX68gTapsB.png)

---

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23zbKpafXUuXqcgN1UqE4ELLLjBk6HWR7VCHXMBWeuuhHvjVr9V26Vu632H51AX3QEB1Q.png)

## Advertising Text:
**"Please follow @worldmappin. The people behind this account work on a cool hive tool and help their members, when they are in need."**

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/EpnDF7XjUzRvHbukYSaPzgLofEeP2bKekjBmuA9oo8mHW8BAv1i1sGfdg5fHShUuuSn.png)

@worldmappin is a team, that operates the site https://worldmappin.com. Whith this tool every hive user can write a travel blog and earn some good Hive, if the quality of the post is good ([rules](https://peakd.com/hive-163772/@worldmappin/guideline-for-your-travel-content-posting-in-worlmappin-community-engesp)). To check this, there are some curators in the team. One of them has a terrible hospital bill to pay. @worldmappin has send 500 HBD to their friend and colleage to help him. Details see [here](https://peakd.com/hive-163772/@worldmappin/lets-support-our-beloved-team-member-ybanezkim26)


# The Reward

The first 10 Hive users, that do this, will get 2.000 Hive each short after the end of the campaign.


# Does it work?
Yes. We did it before. Here is the proof:

* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-241018-week-42-for-ekojah 
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/hive-marketing-campaign-240621-week-25-for-
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-240322-week-12-for-mukadder 
* https://peakd.com/advertising/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-the-hive-marketing-campaign-23120401 
* https://peakd.com/hive-154303/@advertisingbot2/winners-of-marketing-campaing-23111001

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/advertisingbot2/23vrtfBe9soddee9UwH688PMyJYa2GjTPDpiV9s9mAwMHwp7AWurWJanpDDMtpQJx9z89.png)

![grafik.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/23wghGTaUFS6SsidPJ6d5QqyM3cxpzSj2PMQ8r2XZSWHeBAi2jC4e7JdmyTWL8DbtYTpc.png)

# Inviting Former Members
Hi @barbyjr, @luisfe, @azabache2021, @sayury, @lunafrances, @elioe, @orlandobello, @oasiskp2, @cashheaven, @fjworld, @rubyjosleidy27, @carmencitavdc, @adaezeinchrist, @dodokan, @carmenrivas, @hildemaroflores, @konchix, @gr33nm4ster, @flordi, @hermaryrc, @scarletgrissel, @sirkay1, @evaconde, @ayleensatelier,
what do you think? Do you want to join the job again?

# Status of this project

Last week I worked on my report of the charity heroes here on Hive. [Here](https://peakd.com/hive-149312/@charitychecker/charity-heroes-of-week-47) one can see the first result. I checked the hive blockchain for people that help other people with the help of my selftrained AI. And the best results are now listed in this post. In the next weeks I want to automate the process. 
One of the 'winners' of this report is @worldmappin and for this account I want to get some publicity, that is why I sponsor the advertise campain for it.

---

![Questions.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/achimmertens/AKKRqJt1qnuNodPEACGiuC9iauEfvSWwo3w9ACbwELDzPg5VpvwJCsfsA8ptwYH.png)
